text: Mugihe Umuremyi wawe yabwira Abamarayika biwe ati:- jewe nzozana ibindi biremwa bizoza kuba kuri iy’Isi, nabo baciye bavuga bati:- uzoshiramwo abazogira ubwononyi hamwe n’ugusesa amaraso, mugihe twebwe tuguhayagiza nkuko umeze hamwe n’ukukuvuga kubijanye n’ubutagatifu bwawe, Imana yaciye ivuga iti:- mu vy’ukuri jewe ndafise ubumenyi bw’ivyo mwebwe mutazi
